com.openkm.module

接口 MailModule

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DbMailModule, JcrMailModule, OKMMail

    public interface MailModule

    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        Mail create(java.lang.String token,
          Mail mail)
            throws PathNotFoundException,
                   ItemExistsException,
                   VirusDetectedException,
                   AccessDeniedException,
                   RepositoryException,
                   DatabaseException,
                   UserQuotaExceededException
        Create a new mail in the repository.
        参数:
        mail - A mail object with the new mail properties.
        返回:
        A mail object with the new created mail properties.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the parent mail doesn't exist.
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a mail in the repository with the same name in the same path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the parent mail because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        VirusDetectedException
        DatabaseException
        UserQuotaExceededException

      • getProperties

        Mail getProperties(java.lang.String token,
                 java.lang.String mailPath)
                   throws PathNotFoundException,
                          RepositoryException,
                          DatabaseException
        Obtains properties from a previously created mail.
        参数:
        mailPath - The path that identifies an unique mail.
        返回:
        A mail object with the selected mail properties.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the indicated mail doesn't exist.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String token,
          java.lang.String mailPath)
            throws LockException,
                   PathNotFoundException,
                   AccessDeniedException,
                   RepositoryException,
                   DatabaseException
        Delete a mail the repository. It is a logical delete, so really is moved to the user trash and can be restored.
        参数:
        mailPath - The path that identifies an unique mail.
        抛出:
        LockException - Can't delete a mail with locked documents.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no mail in the repository in this path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the mail because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • purge

        void purge(java.lang.String token,
         java.lang.String mailPath)
           throws LockException,
                  PathNotFoundException,
                  AccessDeniedException,
                  RepositoryException,
                  DatabaseException
        Deletes definitively a mail from the repository. It is a physical delete, so the mail can't be restored.
        参数:
        mailPath - The path that identifies an unique mail.
        抛出:
        LockException - Can't delete a mail with locked documents.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no mail in the repository in this path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the mail because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • rename

        Mail rename(java.lang.String token,
          java.lang.String mailPath,
          java.lang.String newName)
            throws PathNotFoundException,
                   ItemExistsException,
                   AccessDeniedException,
                   RepositoryException,
                   DatabaseException
        Rename a mail in the repository.
        参数:
        mailPath - The path that identifies an unique mail.
        newName - The new mail name.
        返回:
        A mail object with the new mail properties.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no mail in the repository in this path.
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a mail in the repository with the same name in the same path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the mail because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • move

        void move(java.lang.String token,
        java.lang.String mailPath,
        java.lang.String dstPath)
          throws PathNotFoundException,
                 ItemExistsException,
                 AccessDeniedException,
                 RepositoryException,
                 DatabaseException
        Move a mail to another location in the repository.
        参数:
        mailPath - The path that identifies an unique mail.
        dstPath - The path of the destination mail.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the dstPath does not exists.
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a mail in the destination mail with the same name.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the parent mail or the destination mail because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • copy

        void copy(java.lang.String token,
        java.lang.String mailPath,
        java.lang.String dstPath)
          throws PathNotFoundException,
                 ItemExistsException,
                 AccessDeniedException,
                 RepositoryException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 AutomationException,
                 DatabaseException,
                 UserQuotaExceededException
        Copy a mail to another location in the repository.
        参数:
        mailPath - The path that identifies an unique mail.
        dstPath - The path of the destination mail.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the dstPath does not exists.
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a mail in the destination mail with the same name.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the parent mail or the destination mail because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        AutomationException
        DatabaseException
        UserQuotaExceededException

      • getChilds

        @Deprecated
java.util.List<Mail> getChilds(java.lang.String token,
                                        java.lang.String fldPath)
                               throws PathNotFoundException,
                                      RepositoryException,
                                      DatabaseException
        已过时。 
        Retrieve a list of child mails from an existing folder.
        参数:
        fldPath - The path that identifies an unique folder.
        返回:
        A Collection with the child folders.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no folder in the repository in this path
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • getChildren

        java.util.List<Mail> getChildren(java.lang.String token,
                               java.lang.String fldPath)
                                 throws PathNotFoundException,
                                        RepositoryException,
                                        DatabaseException
        Retrieve a list of children mails from an existing folder.
        参数:
        fldPath - The path that identifies an unique folder.
        返回:
        A Collection with the child folders.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no folder in the repository in this path
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String mailPath)
                throws PathNotFoundException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException
        Test if a mail path is valid.
        参数:
        mailPath - The path that identifies an unique mail.
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this mail because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no mail in the repository with this path.
        DatabaseException

      • getPath

        java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String token,
                       java.lang.String uuid)
                         throws AccessDeniedException,
                                RepositoryException,
                                DatabaseException
        Get the mail path from a UUID
        参数:
        uuid - The unique mail id.
        返回:
        The mail path
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this folder because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any problem.
        DatabaseException
